h2_title: Water-Wood Beast Boss Fight and Guide
content: As its health starts to get low, it will dive into the water and behave similarly to Jiao-Loong of Waves, where it will try to dive up and catch you by surprise. You'll see it emerge and peek up before it disappears again and the ground begins to rumble. You'll be able to see ripples in the water, that show you the exact path the beast is taking to reach you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Water-Wood_Beast.md', within the main section titled 'Water-Wood Beast', specifically from the subsection 'Water-Wood Beast Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
As its health starts to get low, it will dive into the water and behave similarly to Jiao-Loong of Waves, where it will try to dive up and catch you by surprise. You'll see it emerge and peek up before it disappears again and the ground begins to rumble. You'll be able to see ripples in the water, that show you the exact path the beast is taking to reach you.
